pylayers.gis.layout.Layout.loadfur¶

Layout.loadfur(_filefur)[source]¶

loadfur load a furniture file

Parameters :

_filefur : string

short name of the furniture ini file

Notes

Furniture objects are stored in self.lfur list

Examples

Load a Layout file and an associated furniture ini file

>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> from pylayers.gis.layout import *
>>> L = Layout()
>>> L.load('sircut.str')
>>> L.loadfur('Furw1.ini')
>>> f,a = L.showGs()
>>> plt.show()

(Source code)
